name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript.com is a resource built by the Pluralsight team for the JavaScript community.

name: Python
description: The core of extensible programming is defining functions. Python allows mandatory and optional arguments, keyword arguments, and even arbitrary argument lists.

name: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages. With HTML you can create your own Website. HTML is easy to learn - You will enjoy it!

name: CSS
description: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document. CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.

name: Java
description: Java is a programming language and computing platform first released by Sun Microsystems in 1995.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

name: React
description: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes.

name: Bootstrap
description: Quickly design and customize responsive mobile-first sites with Bootstrap, the world’s most popular front-end open source toolkits.

name: NodeJs
description: Node.js® es un entorno de ejecución para JavaScript construido con el motor de JavaScript V8 de Chrome.

name: Django
description: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

name: Flask
description: Flask is a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require particular tools or libraries.

name: MySQL
description: MySQL Database Service is a fully managed database service to deploy cloud-native applications.

name: PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system with over 30 years of active development.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a document-oriented NoSQL database used for high volume data storage.

name: AWS
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally.

name: GCP
description: Is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally for its end-user products, such as Google Search, Gmail, Google Drive, and YouTube.

name: Github
description: GitHub, Inc. is a provider of Internet hosting for software development and version control using Git.

name: Gitlab
description: GitLab is The DevOps Platform, delivered as a single application. This makes GitLab unique and creates a streamlined software workflow, unlocking your organization from the constraints of a pieced together toolchain.

name: Sentry
description: With Sentry’s performance monitoring you can trace performance issues to poor-performing api calls and slow database queries.

name: Docker
description: Docker takes away repetitive, mundane configuration tasks and is used throughout the development lifecycle for fast, easy and portable application development - desktop and cloud.

name: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service that provides statistics and basic analytical tools for search engine optimization (SEO) and marketing purposes.

name: Heroku
description: Heroku is a platform as a service (PaaS) that enables developers to build, run, and operate applications entirely in the cloud.

name: Azure
description: The Azure cloud platform is more than 200 products and cloud services designed to help you bring new solutions to life.

name: C#
description: C# (pronounced "See Sharp") is a modern, object-oriented, and type-safe programming language.

name: .Net Core
description: .NET es el marco multiplataforma gratuito de código abierto para compilar aplicaciones modernas y servicios en la nube eficaces.
